maneks,ane ban sathisaya sanwegaya saha hada pathulemma nangena sokalapayayi me!!!..werima weri sori..pahugiya tike pulma pul busi una newa..rajakari ehen..gedara undege wade ehen...ee asse me koti waligekuth allagena thiyenne...onna kotimma samahara welawata kamath amathaka wenawa..me pahugiya sikurada onna boruwak musawak ehema neweyi..thun welama kawe hawasa hayata withara...chaliyayi mayi eka dawase..mata wada palahak wadimal..heh, heh, bola mata gawurawe dakkanawa madi bohoma..therunada? ...

ema masaye di ma, jipiyuwen bindi trotski wisin goda naganu labana nawa jathyantharaya ta siya pakshapathithwaya pa්rakasha kala ignas rayis switsarlanthaye losenhi di ghathanaya karanu labi ya. 1938 pebarawariye di parisiye di wyaparayehi yuropaye wadagath ma deshapalana niyojithaya da trotskige wadimahalu putha්raya da wu liyon sedow jipiyuwa wisin maradamana ladi. 1938 juliye di, sammelanayata yantham sathi hayak thibiya di - wyaparaye jathyanthara lekam mandalaye nayakaya wu - rudolf klemant - parisiye ohu ge niwasin pahara gena gos maradamana ladi.
